structures

Class Moon

  • java.lang.Object
    • structures.CircularShape
      • structures.Body
        • structures.Moon

  • public class Moon
extends Body
    Represents a orbiting Body. Always attached to a parent body to which it rotates around.
    Author:
    Sean Lewis

      Creates a new moon.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Moon

        public Moon(int initialAngle,
    int distanceFromBody,
    int radius,
    java.awt.Color color,
    Body orbitingBody)
        Creates a new moon.
        Parameters:
        initialAngle - the initial angle formed from the Body the moon is attached to
        distanceFromBody - the distance the moon will stay at from the Body
        radius - the radius of the Moon
        color - the Color of the Moon
        orbitingBody - the Body the Moon will orbit
